title: Halifax Shipyard
description: Halifax Shipyard's Assembly and Ultra Hall facility is 48 metres high at its highest point and 407 metres long - making it the largest single building for constructing ships in North America. </br></br>Housed inside are two state-of-the-art, fully-enclosed paint booths, moveable elevated production floors, as well as our 12-metre wide panel line and sub-assemblies area.
